name: Free Bunny UI Kit
description:
Free Bunny is an app for people who seek to purchase cruelty-free products.

It allows them to scan barcodes of products, see product screens, search where to find it, access to a wide all cruelty-free brands listing, and more.


Designed in Figma.

A Google UX Design Certificate course assignment.


Mobile device mockup used in thumbnail is by is.graphics


Read the whole case study in Medium
